title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Unify and modernize a 17+ product portfolio into a single scalable, cloud-first, AI-enabled platform.
- Lead a globally distributed engineering org (150–500+ engineers) across multiple hubs (US/India/Europe).
- Drive platform simplification, engineering KPIs/operating cadence, and cost/quality improvements in a PE-backed environment.
- Customer-facing with enterprise accounts; support future M&A diligence and integrations.
fitRationale:
- Strong match to platform consolidation + architecture governance + operating-model work at scale.
- AI-enabled platform shift + multi-product unification is a clean ‘enterprise transformation’ narrative.
- PE value-creation framing (cost/velocity/quality) aligns with ‘trust + performance at scale’ execution discipline.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong ‘data as product’ leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Senior Vice President of Engineering
shortDescription:
- Define and execute engineering vision/strategy aligned with product roadmap for Zeenea’s data intelligence platform.
- Lead transformation for global scale: processes, tools, culture, org structure, and delivery metrics.
- Own technical strategy across AI, connectivity, and cloud operations; ensure scalability, performance, and security.
- Build/mentor senior leaders; scale engineering across geographies; engage customers/partners on integration strategy.
fitRationale:
- Directly aligned to enterprise data platform + governance outcomes (making data trusted and accessible).
- Strong operating-model + metrics + engineering excellence charter (CI/CD, DevOps, observability) that matches your scale playbook.
- Customer/partner integration focus maps to your interoperability + platform ecosystem strengths.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Transformation role: lead multi-year modernization from monolith to AWS cloud-native microservices.
- Own architectural governance (standards, decision-making, review) and exec-level roadmap translation.
- Guide parallel-run migration strategy (legacy + modern), balancing tech debt vs new capabilities.
- Partner with security/ops/product; mentions AI-driven product capabilities.
fitRationale:
- Strong fit for platform modernization + governance + executive alignment strengths.
- Clear value on operating model + standards at scale, not just technical design.
- Good narrative for ‘trust at scale’: migration, reliability, compliance, and AI capability delivery.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Own all technology: product software, ML models, internal tools, and the underlying platform.
- Define 12–36 month technical vision/strategy; communicate effectively with the board.
- Scale a global remote engineering org (experience noted: 70+ team) through Series B+ growth.
- Product sits at AI + remote sensing; ship high-quality product with urgency amid ambiguity.
fitRationale:
- Strong AI platform leadership scope with clear ‘trust at scale’ needs (model lifecycle, quality, reliability, governance).
- Board-facing CTO role plays to your enterprise narrative and executive communication strength.
- Tradeoff: below the >500-employee preference, but unusually broad platform + ML ownership.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Define the architectural vision and prioritize platform-level technology investments for a SaaS platform.
- Establish/enforce architecture standards, policies, and best practices across engineering/IT/security.
- Architect AI/ML systems with governance, model lifecycle management, and responsible AI principles.
- Modernize cloud-native architecture, including data platforms supporting AI/ML workloads at scale.
fitRationale:
- Direct hit on governance + responsible AI + cross-domain architecture leadership (engineering/IT/security).
- Strong platform modernization scope that maps to your enterprise platform + compliance positioning.
- Clean story for ‘trusted AI’ (fairness/transparency/privacy) without being a pure research role.

title: VP Engineering
shortDescription:
- Lead architecture, development, and delivery of an industrial edge-to-cloud data platform.
- Drive high-velocity execution (Agile, CI/CD, DevOps) and scaling engineering operations/metrics.
- Build/mentor a globally distributed engineering org; act as hands-on technical force multiplier.
- Spearhead AI/ML feature integration on top of large-scale industrial data.
fitRationale:
- Strong platform + data + AI integration remit; good narrative around ‘industrial data → AI’ with governance needs.
- Emphasis on operating cadence, delivery metrics, and platform reliability matches your execution DNA.
- Tradeoff: mid-market size vs enterprise preference, but enterprise customers (Fortune 500) are explicit.

title: Senior Director - Cloud Platform Engineering
shortDescription:
- Own cloud platform strategy: security, availability, performance, and cost governance.
- Lead platform infrastructure + observability (Datadog/Prometheus/Grafana); incident/problem management.
- Drive AI-driven automation to improve developer workflows and platform reliability.
- Multi-year transformation for scalable, secure Kubernetes-based cloud platform.
fitRationale:
- Direct alignment to governance/compliance/security + platform engineering at enterprise scale.
- Observability + reliability + cost governance is a strong ‘trust at scale’ execution charter.
- AI/automation-first framing fits your thesis on operationalizing AI safely across platforms.

title: VP of Engineering
location: Remote / Hybrid (US, Poland, Romania, Ukraine hubs)
shortDescription:
- Executive engineering leadership for SignNow at a global workflow automation SaaS company.
- Balance self-serve scale with enterprise-grade reliability for a product used by tens of millions.
- Shape an AI-first roadmap for digital agreements and document/workflow automation.
- Lead a remote-first global org; set engineering excellence and culture in a fast-moving environment.
fitRationale:
- Enterprise SaaS platform + reliability + scale story matches your ‘trust at scale’ positioning.
- Strong fit if you want AI-enabled product leadership with platform rigor (reliability, governance, execution).
- Good brand adjacency to regulated/document-heavy enterprise workflows (compliance-friendly narrative).
